data.text:
@OliverStevenCo1 @Letter_to_Jack Among all these countries you listed, how many of them have you traveled so that you can find out the truth for yourself 
Don’t just sit at home and read everything from social media to pass your judgement
@Letter_to_Jack DIRTY RUSSIAN MONEY???? Which money is clean??
@Letter_to_Jack Dear me. Has your spine broken from all the moral back ending you’re having to do here?

@Vector2op @chibenho @segun_sneh @Letter_to_Jack It's you that needs to get a life and stop sulking,the same you that wants to japa from this country ,is the same you that's happy a war broke out btw countries cuz they are Europeans you care less?who is the hypocrite here?
@Adeyemi9A @chibenho @segun_sneh @Letter_to_Jack Go be silly elsewhere. I’m sure there is some Ukraine sympathizers tweet you can go cry under. Fvck off

@chibenho @segun_sneh @Letter_to_Jack Lol, you schooled abroad right?
From your locator, it says you live in Canada, put yourself in those Nigerian's shoes that were schooling in Ukraine or work there before the war,you are not even in Africa and you talking shit

@Vector2op @chibenho @segun_sneh @Letter_to_Jack My name isn't bright sorry
I'm Olusegun Emmanuel
